name: TempoFiller MCP Server
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for managing Tempo worklogs in JIRA. This server enables AI assistants to interact with Tempo's time tracking system, allowing for worklog retrieval, creation, bulk operations, and management.

tempo_base_url.title: Tempo Base URL
tempo_base_url.description: Your JIRA/Tempo instance base URL (e.g., https://your-company.atlassian.net)

tempo_pat.title: Tempo Personal Access Token
tempo_pat.description: Your Tempo Personal Access Token for API authentication

tempo_default_hours.title: Default Hours Per Day
tempo_default_hours.description: Default number of hours to log per day when not specified
